thread.title: BRIEF-Scorpio Gold Q4 Loss Per Share $0.01

title: BRIEF-Scorpio Gold Q4 Loss Per Share $0.01
text:
Scorpio Gold Corp:
* SCORPIO GOLD REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND PROVIDES YEAR-END FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR 2017
* Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.00 * CASH FLOW FROM OPERATIONS WILL SOON BE INSUFFICIENT TO SUPPORT COMPANY
* REVENUES FROM OPERATIONS HAVE BEEN AND CONTINUE TO BE ADVERSELY AFFECTED, AND CASH FLOW FROM OPERATIONS WILL SOON BE INSUFFICIENT
* SCORPIO GOLD - DOES NOT EXPECT IT WILL BE ABLE TO GENERATE SUFFICIENT CASH FLOWS FROM ITS OPERATIONS TO CONTINUE AS A GOING CONCERN IN NEAR FUTURE
* WILL NEED TO RAISE ADDITIONAL CAPITAL IN COMING MONTHS IN ORDER TO SUPPORT ITS OPERATIONS AND TO SETTLE ITS LONG-TERM DEBT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
